name: Ruby Apartment
address: Unit B1001, OSC Land Residence, 110 Vo Thi Sau, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in Hanoi, 1.1 km from Hanoi Creative City, Ruby Apartment features an outdoor pool and terrace. Ba Dinh Square is 2.1 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

All units feature a flat-screen TV. Some units include a dining area and/or balcony. All units have a kitchen equipped with a microwave and fridge. Ruby Apartment features free WiFi . Bed linen is provided.

Hanoi Opera House is 2.1 km from Ruby Apartment, while National Museum of Vietnamese History is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 24 km from Ruby Apartment.
